Let's visualize the good ol' iris dataset:

```{r include = FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r,echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
ggplot(iris) + geom_point(aes(Sepal.Length,Sepal.Width, color = Species)) + theme_bw() + ggtitle("Sepal Dimensions")
```
